articles.description:
I built Code Typer, a type racer for programmers that uses real code from open-source GitHub projects instead of lorem ipsum. It currently supports 8 languages and includes IDE-like features such as auto-closing brackets and editor shortcuts.

Built with Next.js, Tailwind, Zustand, and Prisma.

Feedback is welcome!
